name: Flappy Crow (ghostwareinteractive)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:  Left click to fly up, let go to fly down. Avoid the obstacles.

Every obstacle you hit will remove 1 life (indicated in bottom left). 
Every 10 points you get 1 life back. 

*Hint*: Stay below the lowest point of the lightning, stay above the highest point of the spears. 

Good luck! Tell me your highscores :D.

Made from the GMTK flappy bird video on YouTube with my own twist. I hope you all enjoy! :)

Music from composer Serhat Ayaz
